head.title: Dynamic Routing
head.description: Examples of dynamic routing with different file structures in Astro project.
head.keywords: Astro dynamic routing, rest parameters, nested routing, i18n routing, multilingual URLs, getStaticPaths, file structure

title: Dynamic Routing
description: Here you can explore different ways to implement dynamic routing with rest parameters and nested folders.

head.title: Dynamic Routing - Service 1
head.description: Example implementation of dynamic routing with i18n support for multilingual websites
head.keywords: Astro dynamic routing, rest parameters, nested routing, i18n routing, multilingual URLs, getStaticPaths, file structure

subpage-1.title: Rest Parameters [...subpage1].astro
subpage-1.description: This subpage demonstrates the implementation of dynamic routing in an Astro project with internationalization. It uses URL structure /dynamic-routing/subpage-1 for English, which automatically converts to the Slovenian version /sl/dinamicno-usmerjanje/podstran-1. Below you can see the actual code that enables this functionality.

subpage-2.title: Nested Routing [subpage2]/[...index].astro
subpage-2.description: This subpage demonstrates the implementation of dynamic routing in an Astro project with internationalization. It uses URL structure /dynamic-routing/subpage-2 for English, which automatically converts to the Slovenian version /sl/dinamicno-usmerjanje/podstran-2.
